title: Combo does not take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not result in it taking focus.
EB: Clicking on the first Combo should result in it taking focus.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application
2. Locate the first Combo
3. Attempt to click on the first Combo and observe that it does not take focus
